objectives: Evaluate evidence and reasoning about housing crisis

multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of housing crisis

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about housing crisis
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about housing crisis
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about housing crisis

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference

Students practice language related to housing crisis using reading_writing approach
